resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete all gathered data?
Are you sure you want to leave the experiment? If so, why?

During your participation in this study, you will be providing personal data about yourself each time you use the IUM to record how happy you are feeling. This data is being collected as part of a research project, and it will only be used for this purpose. It will NOT be disclosed, shared, rented, sold, or otherwise given to any other person or organisation. However, we may use it as anonymous data in refereed research publications, but this will be done in such a way that the data cannot be connected to you, nor you identified with the data. 

 If you have any concerns, doubts, or questions about any aspect of the capture, use, and privacy of the data you will provide, now, or at any time in the future please contact us at:
Tel. +[34] 943 010 885
Email: tourgune@tourgune.org
